imdb.title: Mtv Base: Touching Base
synopsis: Forget what you thought you knew about African urban culture , Touching Base , MTV's new mini-documentary series - will present you to a whole new generation of Afro-cool, and introduce you to the street savvy, super-creative characters whose talent is taking on the world! Touching Base is a new documentary series that will highlight talented young individuals from across Africa. Taking the form of inspiring and beautifully-crafted two-minute documentaries, Touching Base shines a light on Africa's new wave of creative entrepreneurs, spotlighting impressive game-changers from across the continent who are trailblazing in the fields of photography, fashion, illustration, art, filmmaking, music and more.
